Name: Urban Holistic
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: East meets West in this dry refreshing cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Mo Bar, Landmark Mandarin Oriental Hotel, Hong Kong, China.
Nutrition: One serving of Urban Holistic contains 100 calories
